0.2.name: wordpress/mmo-quotes
0.2.description:
MMO Quotes, a quoting plugin.

This plugin is meant to assist in quoting items from MMO developers, using WordPress’s built-in shortcode API.

Usage: [wowquote author=”Author” title=”Title” url=”url”]Content[/wowquote] [lolquote author=”Author” title=”Title” url=”url”]Content[/lolquote]

All parameters are optional.
